        @GET
 @Path(value="/resources")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response resources(@QueryParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String type)
        Returns a list of all resources. If a type is chosen then only resources of that type will be returned. Type of resources to return can also be specified using the type field.
        Parameters:
        type - Type
        Returns:
        Response

      • path

        @GET
 @Path(value="/path{path : .*}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response path(@PathParam(value="path")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String path,
                                                                                                                 @QueryParam(value="relationship")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String relationshipString)
        Returns a list of entities. This could be from traversing the paths, or through searching for a term or an ontology.
        Parameters:
        path - Path
        relationshipString - Relationship
        searchTerm - Search Term
        ontologyType - Ontology Type
        ontologyTerm - Ontology Term
        Returns:
        List of entities
